record.dc:title: 31BN12 Eva Site 6BN12, Benton Co., Tennessee. Feature 1, Area of superimposed hearths - or at least areas of burned clay. Square 51CA. Direction east.
record.wpa:narrative: Areas of burned earth -- hearths 2.8 DD, 3.4 DD. The association of the specimens with a hearth or floor level is open to doubt. However, if they can be legitimately associated with a level they would go with the lower and more extensive one.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution.
